action: I want to accurately apply for business expenses such as transportation and lodging with necessary evidence
reason: Because I need to ensure proper approval and accounting processing in accordance with company regulations
acceptance_criteria: The system shall restrict expense applications to authenticated users and automatically link them to the applicant's account with a unique Application ID.
The system must require selection of an Expense Type from master data (e.g., Transportation, Lodging) and validate that the Amount is a positive numeric value.
The system shall support corporate standard or foreign currencies, automatically recording the exchange rate for foreign transactions.
The system must require a Transaction Date (prohibiting future dates), a Payee name, and a Description of at least 10 characters.
The system shall require a mandatory receipt attachment (JPG/PNG/PDF, max 10MB), execute a virus scan, and store valid files in tamper-proof storage.
The system must perform OCR processing to extract amount, date, and payee, and trigger a warning if discrepancies with input values are detected.
The system shall allow saving applications as 'Draft' without triggering approval, and execute full validation upon submission.
The system must flag or automatically reject applications exceeding defined limits and detect potential duplicate submissions based on date and amount.
The system shall allow associating expenses with Department codes, Project codes, and Cost Centers.
The system must initiate an approval workflow upon submission, managing transitions between defined statuses (Draft to Paid) and recording all state changes.
The system shall execute persistence within a transaction, use parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection, and sanitize inputs against XSS.
The system must transmit data to the accounting system via API, utilizing a retry queue for failed attempts.
The system shall prohibit editing of finalized expenses and allow application withdrawal only prior to approval.
The system must integrate with machine learning scoring services for fraud detection and auditing purposes.
The system shall encrypt PII at rest, store audit logs in tamper-evident storage, and adhere to the corporate data retention policy.
The system must enforce HTTPS (TLS 1.2+), rate limiting, and target an API response time of under 500ms.
The system shall publish notification events to an asynchronous message queue upon successful application.
